destinations.title: Warsaw
destinations.description: Warsaw is the capital and largest city of Poland, combining modern dynamism with historical landmarks such as the Old Town and the legendary Royal Castle.

destinations.title: Krakow
destinations.description: Krak√≥w is the former capital of Poland, known for its rich history, well-preserved and beautiful medieval architecture, and the impressive Wawel Castle.

destinations.title: Wroclaw
destinations.description: Wroc≈Çaw is known for its colorful architecture, beautiful bridges, and riverfront promenades, making it one of the most charming cities in Poland.

aboutUs.title: About ≈Å√≥d≈∫
aboutUs.description: ≈Å√≥d≈∫ is a fascinating city full of creativity and history. The street art and murals give it a unique character, while places like the OFF Piotrkowska complex offer a vibrant atmosphere with trendy cafes, restaurants, and art spaces. The city's industrial past blends perfectly with its modern, artistic vibe.

reviewList.text: I like that everyone follows the rules and shows great respect on the roads. The city offers a true sense of peace, and I enjoyed every moment while walking without worrying about anything. Everything felt calm, with no rush, and trams, buses, and trains were always punctual, which made daily life much easier.
reviewList.name: Stavroula Papoutsi

reviewList.text: The Erasmus experience in ≈Å√≥d≈∫ was the highlight of my student years and one of the best experiences of my life. Poland is a beautiful country, and ≈Å√≥d≈∫ is a large and lively city, perfect for those looking to experience big-city life. I encourage everyone to apply for Erasmus ‚Äî you won't regret it.
reviewList.name: David Slavik

reviewList.text: Arriving in one of the less favored cities in Poland turned into a wonderful journey. ≈Å√≥d≈∫ offers a unique atmosphere with its blend of Eastern European spirit, multicultural diversity, and industrial soul, creating a truly special vibe that stays with you.
reviewList.name: Natalia Pilch

aboutPage.subTitle: Why choose ≈Å√≥d≈∫?
aboutPage.paragraph1: ≈Å√≥d≈∫ is a city that perfectly blends a rich industrial heritage with a modern spirit and creative energy. Located in the heart of Poland, it is an ideal base for exploring the entire country. ≈Å√≥d≈∫ offers a unique mix of cultural diversity, vibrant arts, and innovative projects, creating an inspiring environment for students, young professionals, and travelers alike.
aboutPage.paragraph2: The city is renowned for its murals, historic factories transformed into modern spaces, and excellent transport connections. With affordable living costs and a welcoming atmosphere, ≈Å√≥d≈∫ is a perfect choice for those seeking a dynamic yet comfortable experience.
